raw_requirements: The user wants to create a task management application.

functional_analysis.main_problem: Users need a way to effectively manage their tasks and to-do items.
main_use_cases: Users can create, assign, and track tasks
Users can set due dates and receive reminders
Users can collaborate on shared tasks
assumptions: Users will access the app on both mobile and desktop devices
Integration with calendar and email apps will be important
risks: Ensuring a simple and intuitive user experience
Differentiating from existing task management tools
pending_questions: What are the key features that will make this app stand out?
How will user data and privacy be handled?
